email_text:
Subject: Urgent COVID-19 Relief Assistance Form

Dear Citizen,

In response to the ongoing global pandemic, the government is offering financial relief to individuals affected by COVID-19. As a government agency dedicated to supporting our citizens during these challenging times, we are reaching out to provide you with an opportunity to receive assistance.

To access the relief funds, we kindly ask you to fill out the attached form with your personal information, including your full name, address, social security number, and bank account details. This information is necessary to process your application and ensure that the funds are deposited directly into your account.

Please understand that time is of the essence, and we urge you to submit the form as soon as possible to expedite the processing of your relief assistance. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated, and we are committed to helping you navigate through these uncertain times.

Thank you for your attention to this matter, and we look forward to providing you with the support you need during this challenging period.

Sincerely,

Government Relief Agency

[Attached Form: COVID-19 Relief Assistance Form]
